title: Strengthening Instructional Practice Competencies: Building a Collaborative Culture for Academic Achievement of Students with Disabilities: Blended

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental Understanding of Disabilities and General Teaching Experience
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can apply three practical tools for collaborative instructional design: shared professional development, implementation strategy formulation, and assessment capability enhancement
Learners can design a collaborative system among teachers to support students with disabilities in online and offline environments
Learners can write reports analyzing the impact of collaborative culture on academic achievement through project-based assessments
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
